scripts.say: Due to fuel shortage and unavoidable damages, the chase has become troublesome for Choukaiâ€¦ the submarines are facing the same problem...
Nothing would change. Even if the entire fleet went into action, we won't achieve any great victory at our current speed.
Yes, yes, I know the truth can be hard to accept. Just let the Air Forces deal with it this time. When the final battle comes, the stage will be ours.
Enough! You are always so persuasive...
